detail_desc: Short dress in woven fabric with an opening at the top and small stand-up collar with ties at the front. Long raglan sleeves, narrow cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar and opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Trainers with scuba, mesh and imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, lacing and a tongue with a fabric appliqué at the front, and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made from recycled polyester, and chunky, fluted soles.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a turned-up hem.
Long-sleeved slub jersey top in a soft viscose blend. Relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline, open chest pocket and slits in the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Longer-style cardigan in an airy, textured knit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Cardigan in a soft, rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long wide sleeves, a patch front pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny, tapered legs.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and narrow ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly, side pockets and flared legs with sewn-in creases front and back.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Knee-length, printed swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short, fitted skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Knee-length, fitted skirt in soft twill containing some wool with a brushed finish. Wrapover with a decorative button and fringing at the front ,and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Leggings in soft velour with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
High-waisted shorts in bouclé made from a cotton blend with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Fancy dress costume with a zip down the front, hood with appliqués and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with a frilled shaft and elasticated tops.
Jumper in a soft knit containing glittery threads with long, slightly wider raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra with an elasticated hem and elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Trainers in a cotton weave with lacing at the front, soft insoles and fluted soles.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and wide, tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Trousers in supple imitation suede with a regular waist, front pockets, welt back pockets, a zip fly and button and tapered legs with decorative seams.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, patterned knit with long sleeves and no buttons.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh shoulder straps and a narrow racer back with elastic straps.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, deep V-neck and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved tunic in jersey crêpe with a rounded hem.
Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and short slits at the hems.
Cotton espadrilles with elastic gores in the sides and a braided jute trim around the soles. Cotton linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft viscose and cotton jersey with a wide lace flounce at the top.

Set with a pair of ballet pumps in imitation leather and a hairband in cotton jersey. Shoes with a satin bow on the front and elastic strap over the foot. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave. Hairband with a satin bow at the front.

Slightly longer, lightly padded bomber jacket in satin made from recycled polyester with a ribbed, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Diagonal welt pockets with a press-stud at the front, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Canvas trainers with contrasting colour details, a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Satin pyjamas with decorative trims. Pyjama shirt with covered buttons and front pockets. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with 3/4-length puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Short-sleeved shirt in Oxford cotton with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fine-knit jumper in a modal and cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck and long sleeves.

Shirt in premium cotton with a grandad collar, French front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sandals with imitation suede straps, an elastic heel strap and wedge heels. Satin insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 6 cm.
Ballet pumps in shimmering imitation leather with a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles.

Soft, non-wired push-up bra with moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, covered elastic at the hem and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Single-breasted jacket in marled wool with narrow notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole, one chest pocket, jetted front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Jeans in stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort. Classic fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets and straight legs with an extra leg pocket.
Sleeveless top in a soft, hole-knit cotton blend. Narrow cut at the top and slits in the sides.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a sequined appliqué on the front, flap with a hook and loop fastening, and a narrow, braided shoulder strap. Lined. Size approx. 4.5x10x12 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets, elasticated cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-4Y with normal sequins).
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif on the front and deep neckline at the back.
Boxy-style T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Shaping bikers in microfibre with a high, elasticated waist, lined gusset and longer legs with laser-cut hems. Light shaping effect on the tummy, bum and thighs.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short blouse in a checked viscose weave with a square neckline, buttons down the front and short sleeves.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and a ribbed scalloped edge around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem. Wide fit, longer at the back.
Briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Fitted jacket in twill made from a linen and viscose blend with notch lapels and a button at the front. Jetted front pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with a small slit at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

Long dress in an airy weave with a sweetheart neckline, wrapover, draped wrapover bodice with a concealed silicone trim at the top and boning. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back, a seam under the bust and a long, wide skirt. Satin lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with dropped shoulders and a flounce trim on the sleeves.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in airy, crinkled chiffon. Narrow cut at the top with an opening and button at the back of the neck, a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist and long, wide legs. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short velour top with a deep V-neck at the front, small collar that fastens at the back of the neck, an opening at the back and long sleeves.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar with a zip at the front and a kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sun hat in cotton chambray with sewn-on ears at the top and narrow ties. Cotton lining.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Long-sleeved body in stretch fabric with a stand-up collar, opening front and back, and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Seam at the hips, a microfibre lower section and a lined gusset with press-studs.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a decorative lace trim at the top with a small bow at the front. Press-studs at the crotch and elastication around the hems.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Large plastic hair clip. Width approx. 10.5 cm.
Earrings in metal an plastic with decorative sparkly stones.
